system.description:
At 8th level, you’ve reached the pinnacle of what a runespell rager can accomplish, forcing you to specialize to advance your studies. Choose one of the following:

  • Berserk Rager: Whenever you cast a spell with a casting time of an action or bonus action that requires concentration, you may simultaneously enter a rage. In addition, if that spell requires your action to activate each turn, you may make a single attack with your runescar weapon after activating the spell.
    Finally, you regain 1 spell point whenever you score a critical hit with a weapon that qualifies for Furious Critical.

  • Eldritch Rager: While raging, your spell save DC increases by 1. In addition, the damage that you deal with spells that require concentration is increased by an amount equal to your Constitution ability modifier.

No description available.
